mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.number AS "number", a.password AS "password", a.full_name AS "fullName", a.gender AS "gender", a.class_id AS "classId", a.class_name AS "className", a.profession_id AS "professionId", a.profession_name AS "professionName", a.grade_id AS "gradeId", a.grade_name AS "gradeName", a.department_id AS "departmentId", a.department_name AS "departmentName", a.platoon_id AS "platoonId", a.platoon_name AS "platoonName", a.company_id AS "companyId", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.battalion_id AS "battalionId", a.battalion_name AS "battalionName", a.mobile_number AS "mobileNumber", a.qq AS "qq", a.wx AS "wx", a.img_url AS "imgUrl", a.address AS "address", a.identity AS "identity", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: insert into mt_user_info( name, number, password, full_name, gender, class_id, class_name, profession_id, profession_name, grade_id, grade_name, department_id, department_name, platoon_id, platoon_name, company_id, company_name, battalion_id, battalion_name, mobile_number, qq, wx, img_url, address, identity, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, status ) values ( #{name}, #{number}, #{password}, #{fullName}, #{gender}, #{classId}, #{className}, #{professionId}, #{professionName}, #{gradeId}, #{gradeName}, #{departmentId}, #{departmentName}, #{platoonId}, #{platoonName}, #{companyId}, #{companyName}, #{battalionId}, #{battalionName}, #{mobileNumber}, #{qq}, #{wx}, #{imgUrl}, #{address}, #{identity}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{status} )

mapper.update: update mt_user_info set name = #{name}, number = #{number}, password = #{password}, full_name = #{fullName}, gender = #{gender}, class_id = #{classId}, class_name = #{className}, profession_id = #{professionId}, profession_name = #{professionName}, grade_id = #{gradeId}, grade_name = #{gradeName}, department_id = #{departmentId}, department_name = #{departmentName}, platoon_id = #{platoonId}, platoon_name = #{platoonName}, company_id = #{companyId}, company_name = #{companyName}, battalion_id = #{battalionId}, battalion_name = #{battalionName}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}, qq = #{qq}, wx = #{wx}, img_url = #{imgUrl}, address = #{address}, identity = #{identity}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
